column4: I have an old machine with a geforce 4 mx and want to know which version of ubuntu or what driver will give the best video performance or directly support that card in general?
that old a card - its proberly not going to matter much.   the rest of the system specs will proberly be the bottleneck
the old nvidia drivers for that card proberly havent changed in the last few releases. So i doubt if its going tobe noticeable.
it depends on the exact card and exact driver.. Im not sure if that applies to nvidia cards..  since there are the nvidia-legacy drivers in the repos.. it CAN apply to ati cards
